trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_SEQ_00<tab>Mawt is whispering to herself in sinister tones.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_00<tab>Place the fresh vegetables at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_01<tab>Wait for an Abalathian catoblepas to appear, then use the paralytic powder on the creature and slay it for its eye.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the catoblepas eye to Mawt.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_000<tab>Do you know what a catoblepas is? You don't see them around much these days, but I spotted one that strayed from its herd.

TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_001<tab>The eye of such a creature is said to possess baneful powers. I want it. I <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> it! Now, I'm just a delicate lass, but I'll wager you'd have no trouble popping it free from that wandering monster's skull.

TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_002<tab>Here, I have it all planned out: bait this spot over to the west with these vegetables, and wait for the catoblepas to toddle over and take a nibble. Then you fling this paralytic powder in its face!
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_003<tab>That should slow it down enough to let you strike a clean killing blow─I don't want any harm to come to that precious eye. Right, then! I'll be waiting!
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_004<tab>Was the plan not clear? Bait the spot with the vegetables, numb the catoblepas with the powder, then ease that wondrously evil eye from its socket!
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_005<tab>I get a talisman of accursed power, and you get a pick from my hoarded goods. We both win!
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_010<tab>Evil eye, evil eye, how I wish that you were mine... Well? Did you get it? Is it unblemished?
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_011<tab>Yes! It's perfect! Ah, just gazing into this foreboding orb sends a chill through my soul!
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_012<tab>As my dear, departed nana used to say, “If you want the nastiest curse, use the eye of a catoblepas!”
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_013<tab>Ahahaha. Mwahaha! Gyahahahahaha! My revenge is nigh, you imperial bastards! May the fleas of a thousand jhammels infest your nethers!
